history.content: So unless you have completed the requirements for graduation already, you cannot take courses P/NP as an EECS major.

I am palnning to take three upper div technical for next semester. As three technical is usually pretty heavy load, I am thinking of taking one of them as P/NP and not worry too much about the grade in this particular class. I don't see any problems acheiving the required number of units for graduation with this approach. Does EECS department  allow taking upper div class P/NP? Can some one share their experience with similar approach?

My current thought is to take CS182, CS161 for grade and maybe take EEC128 for P/NP.
history.subject: Taking upper div technicals as P/NP
